prompt:
The police raided the chop shop just as the thieves were stripping down the stolen SUV for its valuable engine parts.
He made a fortune running a chop shop in the industrial district, turning hot cars into untraceable components overnight.
Undercover agents infiltrated the chop shop network, gathering evidence on how they dismantled luxury vehicles piece by piece.
The chop shop owner fled the country after a tip-off led to the seizure of dozens of disassembled motorcycles.
In the heart of the city, the chop shop buzzed with activity as crews cut apart sedans under dim fluorescent lights.
She discovered her missing car at a notorious chop shop, where it was already halfway reduced to scrap metal.
The gang's chop shop specialized in high-end sports cars, selling off engines and rims to black market buyers.
Authorities shut down the chop shop after finding VIN numbers filed off hundreds of stolen vehicle frames.
Working in a chop shop required quick hands and no questions asked about the origins of the arriving trucks.
The chop shop fire revealed a warehouse full of partially chopped vehicles, sparking a major insurance fraud investigation.
